page.title: 06SMALL BUSINESS IN WOODBORO'
page.content: In our grid square there are a few small businesses scattered about eg: {PODDER MOTOR SPARES,WICKS CAMPING {CENTRE,FLORALANDS GARDEN CENTRE,FEW {PUBS AND 2 GARAGES}these are small but varied. We will focus in on {PODDER {MOTOR SPARES}as an example. Podders has been going for 17yrs.Its purpose is to sell and then break up old cars.It takes up 2.5 acres and employs 14 full time and 5 part time workers.It takes an average of 50_60 cars a week.Machinery includes 3 forklifts,1 crane which weighs 16 tons each.They used to have a car crusher but flogged it.The most common car they get is ford and the average money you get for a car is Â£25_Â£500 for a fairly special one.Recently they have formed a tyre centre and now sell and fit remould tyres.PODDERS had a lot of trouble acquiringthe land.
